query:
SELECT 'Total alunos' as metrica, COUNT(*) as valor FROM alunos
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Com mentoria', COUNT(DISTINCT student_id) FROM mentoring_sessions
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Sem mentoria', COUNT(*) FROM alunos WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT student_id FROM mentoring_sessions)
